org.apache.paimon.operation

Interface FileStoreWrite<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of record to write.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Restorable<List<FileStoreWrite.State<T>>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BundleFileStoreWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileStoreWrite, AppendOnlyFileStoreWrite, KeyValueFileStoreWrite, MemoryFileStoreWrite

    public interface FileStoreWrite<T>
extends Restorable<List<FileStoreWrite.State<T>>>
    Write operation which provides RecordWriter creation and writes SinkRecord to FileStore.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FileStoreWrite.State<T>
      Recoverable state of FileStoreWrite.

      • withInsertOnly

        void withInsertOnly(boolean insertOnly)
        This method is called when the insert only status of the records changes.
        Parameters:
        insertOnly - If true, all the following records would be of RowKind.INSERT, and no two records would have the same primary key.

      • write

        void write(BinaryRow partition,
           int bucket,
           T data)
    throws Exception
        Write the data to the store according to the partition and bucket.
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition of the data
        bucket - the bucket id of the data
        data - the given data
        Throws:
        Exception - the thrown exception when writing the record

      • compact

        void compact(BinaryRow partition,
             int bucket,
             boolean fullCompaction)
      throws Exception
        Compact data stored in given partition and bucket. Note that compaction process is only submitted and may not be completed when the method returns.
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to compact
        bucket - the bucket to compact
        fullCompaction - whether to trigger full compaction or just normal compaction
        Throws:
        Exception - the thrown exception when compacting the records

      • notifyNewFiles

        void notifyNewFiles(long snapshotId,
                    BinaryRow partition,
                    int bucket,
                    List<DataFileMeta> files)
        Notify that some new files are created at given snapshot in given bucket.

        Most probably, these files are created by another job. Currently this method is only used by the dedicated compact job to see files created by writer jobs.

        Parameters:
        snapshotId - the snapshot id where new files are created
        partition - the partition where new files are created
        bucket - the bucket where new files are created
        files - the new files themselves

      • prepareCommit

        List<CommitMessage> prepareCommit(boolean waitCompaction,
                                  long commitIdentifier)
                           throws Exception
        Prepare commit in the write.
        Parameters:
        waitCompaction - if this method need to wait for current compaction to complete
        commitIdentifier - identifier of the commit being prepared
        Returns:
        the file committable list
        Throws:
        Exception - the thrown exception

      • close

        void close()
    throws Exception
        Close the writer.
        Throws:
        Exception - the thrown exception
